title: const_generics ICE when propagating const parameter within inherent implementation

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

body:
The following compiles:
```rust
#![feature(const_generics)]

pub fn x<const I: usize>() {}
pub fn y<const I: usize>() {
    x::<{I}>();
}
```
[playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=release&edition=2018&gist=d5a905f7a12dd19a13c074e9960f654b)

And so does:
```rust
#![feature(const_generics)]

struct S;

impl S {
    pub fn x() {}
    pub fn y<const I: usize>() {
        Self::x();
    }
}
```
[playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=release&edition=2018&gist=8cf56520e3f4a3fd01816109548c9ef6)

However, the following does not:
```rust
#![feature(const_generics)]

struct S;

impl S {
    pub fn x<const I: usize>() {}
    pub fn y<const I: usize>() {
        Self::x::<{I}>();
    }
}
```
[playground](https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=release&edition=2018&gist=4deffca792af59b49447510709c7173c)
```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected const parent path Expr(expr(HirId { owner: DefIndex(17), local_id: 9 }: <Self>::x::<>))

error: internal compiler error: cat_expr Errd
 --> src\lib.rs:8:19
  |
8 |         Self::x::<{I}>();
  |                   ^^^

 --> src\lib.rs:8:19
  |
8 |         Self::x::<{I}>();
  |                   ^^^

error: internal compiler error: QualifyAndPromoteConstants: MIR had errors
 --> src\lib.rs:8:19
  |
8 |         Self::x::<{I}>();
  |                   ^^^

error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DefId(0:19 ~ reproduce[b9f9]::{{impl}}[0]::y[0]::{{constant}}[0]) ("return type"): bad type [type error]
 --> src\lib.rs:8:19
  |
8 |         Self::x::<{I}>();
  |                   ^^^

error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DefId(0:19 ~ reproduce[b9f9]::{{impl}}[0]::y[0]::{{constant}}[0]) (LocalDecl { mutability: Mut, is_user_variable: None, internal: false, is_block_tail: None, ty: [type error], user_ty: UserTypeProjections { contents: [] }, name: None, source_info: SourceInfo { span: src\lib.rs:8:19: 8:22, scope: scope[0] }, visibility_scope: scope[0] }): bad type [type error]
 --> src\lib.rs:8:19
  |
8 |         Self::x::<{I}>();
  |                   ^^^

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued', src\librustc_errors\lib.rs:360:17

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
```
